frontmatter.title: Black Steel Pipes
frontmatter.title_meta: Black Steel Pipes - Chinh Dai Steel
frontmatter.description: Chinh Dai Company’s Black Steel Pipes Products are manufactured based on Japanese standard JIS G3466 in order to make a breakthrough solution of quality, price as well as other economic benefits therefore, they have high durability, perfect resistance to corrosion and rust, and suitability for sea area’s construction (high oxidation).
frontmatter.keyword: Black Steel Pipes - Chinh Dai Steel
